original_text: Also in the fifteenth day of the seventh month, when ye have gathered in the fruit of the land, ye shall keep a feast unto the Lord seven days: on the first day shall be a sabbath, and on the eighth day shall be a sabbath.
korean_text: 너희가 토지 소산 거두기를 마치거든 일곱째 달 열닷샛날부터 이레 동안 여호와의 절기를 지키되 첫 날에도 안식하고 여덟째 날에도 안식할 것이요

sentences.original_text: Also in the fifteenth day of the seventh month
when ye have gathered in the fruit of the land
ye shall keep a feast unto the Lord seven days
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 이레 동안 주를 위한 절기를 지킬지니

sentences.original_text: on the first day shall be a sabbath
and on the eighth day shall be a sabbath
